name: redly-ea
description: An enterprise architecture visualization, impact analysis and asset management tool

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run gh-pages
scripts.lint: npm run biome:lint && npm run tsc
scripts.start:desktop: npm run prestart:desktop:port && npm run prestart:desktop && cross-env UMI_ENV=dev PORT=8003 max dev
scripts.desktop:dev: npm run desktop:ensure-electron && npm run prestart:desktop:ports && npm run prestart:desktop && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n api,web,desktop -c "green,cyan,magenta" "npm run api:dev" "npm run start:desktop" "npm run desktop:electron"
scripts.desktop:dist: concurrently -k -n api,desktop -c "green,magenta" "npm run api:dev" "npm run build && electron ./electron/main.js"
scripts.desktop:build: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=1 npm run build && npm run validate:build && npm run desktop:icons && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.desktop:build:win: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=1 npm run build && npm run validate:build && npm run desktop:icons && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win
scripts.desktop:build:mac: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=1 npm run build && npm run validate:build && npm run desktop:icons && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.desktop:build:linux: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=1 npm run build && npm run validate:build && npm run desktop:icons && npx electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux
scripts.desktop:test-prod: cross-env ELECTRON_BUILD=1 npm run build && electron ./electron/main.js
scripts.release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_BUILD=1 pnpm run build && pnpm run validate:build && pnpm run desktop:icons && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.release:win: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_BUILD=1 pnpm run build && pnpm run validate:build && pnpm run desktop:icons && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --win
scripts.release:mac: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_BUILD=1 pnpm run build && pnpm run validate:build && pnpm run desktop:icons && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --mac
scripts.release:linux: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ELECTRON_BUILD=1 pnpm run build && pnpm run validate:build && pnpm run desktop:icons && pnpm exec electron-builder --config electron-builder.json --linux
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
